Summary: Square,Circle shape. Black then went white. came out of nowhere and then disappeared.
divs: Sighting Details1.I was outside looking for something and I looked up and saw This Square black thing in the sky and then it turned into a circle white shape and then it disappeared. 2.I Just looked up at the stars for no reason. 3.I thought it was a UFO. 4.It was a black square and then it became a white circle shape and then it zoomed off and left a trail of smoke but it went away as soon as the UFO left. 5.I was in shock. and then I panic and ran inside. 6.The Object zoomed away in the middle of the sky so I could not see where it went to.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brooklet
There were no other sightings in Brooklet on or around October 16th 2012
